channel.title: Tutorial on filippo.im
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorial on filippo.im

item.title: How to create a site using HUGO
item.description: Want to have a site similar to mine without spending a dime? Do you want it a little more beautiful? Then you’re in the right place! A few days ago I had a few hours free during an afternoon and I wanted to try my hand at what I thought was one of the greatest feats in human history. Well, thank goodness, it wasn’t as hard as I thought it would be.
